definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 111:a. [[בֵּית־דָּגוֹן]]: Jerome:opp. (ed. Vallarsl). iii. 38 defines as domus tritici, and says Id.:ib. 174): ‘sed et usque hodie grandis vicus Capherdago inter Diospolim et Jamnian demonstratur.’ [Elsewhere he defines [[דגון]] (Id.:ib. 48) as ‘piscis tristitiae’] (HPS, privately).
